title: Making me download the 5.13 patch AGAIN
body: I downloaded the patch and then played a few games where my game crashed at the voctory screen... It just froze, its been happening to many people, I think its a bug too. So I had to force restart my computer and it is making me redownload the entire patch. Rito Halp!

replies.body:
Hope that doesn't happen to me.

I'm running on limited data
wtf riot ********** my net speed is low why i must download patch agian???????????????????????????????????{{champion:266}} {{champion:266}} {{champion:266}}
The same issue happened to me except my game didn't crash. I logged out of the game and went onto the internet for a bit and then when I opened it back up again, the client restarted the download.
I generally don't have problems with the game. Should I just let the client redownload?

It redownloaded once and it's been fine since.

Repair your clients.

I have no idea why this is happening. I closed down the client. Then I wanted to get back on to League of Legends and now it's scanning files as if I didn't patch the client when I did in the morning...-_-
HOLY FUCK RITO FIX YO SHIT
Same happend to me. Restarted the game and have to patch again. With my slow internet it takes so much time so I can't play a single game today.
It's doing the same for me too. Yo Riot Please help us {{item:3070}}

My internet is soo slow, it just took me several hours to patch {{item:3070}} {{champion:119}} {{item:3070}} 
WHYYYYY?
